attributes.action: extra money per week for jobseekers willing to do work in the community or community service
attributes.additional_details: as all jobseekers seem to be stereo typed as lazy and work shy but not all are some people are struggeling to find work i think that jobseekers should be offered extra money on top if they are willing to do part time community work this could be cleaning streets getting rid of graffiti or working in libarys or as crossing wrdens / lollypop people ect, or maybe helping disabled  or o.a.p.s or homeless people in there local community this would also stop jobseekers sitting at home with no focus in life add when they go to a job interview rather than saying im on benifits and not working at the min they could say im on benefits but i help out in the community which would show they are not lazy and deserve a job
